definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Pharmacologist is seriously studying the hypersusceptibility reaction of this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 药理学家们正在认真研究这种药的过敏反应。

sentences.english: The drug concentration of Zhi Gancao Decoction contained serum was examined by serologic pharmacological test.
sentences.chinese: 血清药理学法确定血清中炙甘草汤含药浓度。

sentences.english: The Pharmacological functions of fungi polysaccharides were well studied and have drawn much attention.
sentences.chinese: 真菌多糖的药理作用已得到广泛的研究与关注。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe pharmacological effects of Zhenke Zhichuan Tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察镇咳止喘咀嚼片的主要药理作用。

sentences.english: This is a view on the chemical composition and Pharmacological Function of Colla Corii Asini.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了中药阿胶的化学成分及其药理药效作用。

sentences.english: Who knows Luo Kai its pharmacodynamics action and concerned content?
sentences.chinese: 洛凯谁知道它的药理作用和有关内容？

sentences.english: Chemical constituents and their pharmacological research progress in medicinal plants of Glechoma Linn.
sentences.chinese: 活血丹属植物的化学成分及药理研究进展。

sentences.english: However, much more research will be necessary to clarify the pharmacology of indigo naturalis.
sentences.chinese: 但是，茯灵的药理作用要阐明，还需要大量的研究。

sentences.english: Figures and diagrams are based on the textbook Essential Psychopharmacology, c1996.
sentences.chinese: 数字和图表是基于教科书的基本精神药理学，时限。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Progress in recent pharmacological studies of Rosmarinic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨迷迭香酸药理研究近况。

sentences.english: The study was published Tuesday by the European College of Neuropsychopharmacology.
sentences.chinese: 神经心理药理学欧洲学会星期二发布了这项研究结果。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of Placenta Hominis and its substitutes on learning and memory ability in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨紫河车及其代用品改善学习记忆的药理作用。

sentences.english: Objective To review the pharmacological action and clinical application of Radix Astragali .
sentences.chinese: 目的综述黄芪的药理作用及临床应用的研究概况。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the pharmacological effects oft he different components of atractylodes chinensis.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较苍术不同部位的药理作用。

sentences.english: The findings were published in the February 9 Neuropsychopharmacology.
sentences.chinese: 在2月9号的神经精神药理学杂志上发布了这项发现。

sentences.english: The pharmacological actions of punica granatum L. are reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对国内外石榴的药理作用研究进行了综述。

definition: medicine made from a single herb/drug made from a single substance
to blend two or more medicines/compatibility (of herbal remedies, medicines)
